name: Grégoire & Marcel
description:
Meet best friends Grégoire and Marcel !

All his life, Grégoire dreamt of becoming a trampoline artist : particularly, he wants to jump higher than anyone else ! To support his dear friend in this endavour, the gourmet Marcel offered to become his own super-trampoline, by eating deliciously greasy goods to become extra bouncy.

Using the left and right arrow keys, slide Marcel around to catch Grégoire falling down. Keep consuming the food coming down from the sky, BUT avoid vegetables !! The bigger Marcel is, the higher Grégoire can jump ! If you stop eating, Marcel will start deflating...

Help Grégoire achieve his dream, and make him bounce as high as you possibly can! Let's reach space, everybody!!

Game is over when Marcel fails to catch Grégoire.

-----

Use arrow keys to navigate menus, select with space or enter.

-----

Programming - Gaëtan Piou

Sound Design & Music - Philippe-Albert Leblanc

Art - marin

-----

fonts used : Shaabyla | dafont.com & Winter Land by JD | dafont.com
